title: Simulation Education Based on the IEb Learning Model for Enhancing Medicinal Plant Utilization and Environmental Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic biology and environmental conservation concepts, along with proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: For working professionals requiring practical understanding of sustainable environmental management, providing immersive learning experiences through VR/simulation

learning_goals: Learners can explain the ecological characteristics of medicinal plants and sustainable utilization methods.
Learners can design solutions for community environmental issues by applying the IEb model.
Learners can evaluate the economic and environmental value of medicinal plant conservation through VR simulations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
